metadata.title: Hospital Emergency Management of Emerging Infectious Disease using Instant Communication Technology

body_text.text: Chih-Hao Lin and Chih-Hsien Chi conceived the study. Chih-Hao Lin contributed to acquisition of data and performed statistical analysis. Chih-Hao Lin drafted the manuscript. Chih-Hao Lin, Chih-Chia Hsieh, and Chih-Hsien Chi contributed substantially to its revision. Chih-Hao Lin is the corresponding author who takes responsibility for the paper as a whole.
